articleHtml:
Note: All times local 

Ottawa, Ontario 

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Amsterdam, Netherlands.

Canada Reception Centre
190 Clear Skies Private

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 7:30 a.m.

Amsterdam, Netherlands 

8:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

Amsterdam Schiphol International Airport

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
